# bls

## install

https://github.com/herumi/bls/

## test

    make

    ./bls12_381_keygen

    ./bls12_381_export_pubkey [seckey]

    ./bls_sign [seckey] [msg]

    ./bls_verify [pubkey] [msg] [sig]
    
    ./bls_multi_sign [msg] [seckey1] [seckey2] ... [seckey20]

## test vector
